body_html:
I resolved the conflict:

  • I already had the expanduser calls in there so ~home dirs should work
  • I left in the license checking

I think this PR improves NCCL2 configuration in configure.py, which is currently not that great.

body:
I resolved the conflict:
- I already had the expanduser calls in there so ~home dirs should work
- I left in the license checking

I think this PR improves NCCL2 configuration in configure.py, which is currently not that great.
